Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents:
Title: Sharḥ al-Tajrīd; Pp. 16-255. A commentary on Ṭusī's Tajrīd al-Iʿtiqād, on philosophical issues concerning the subject of metaphysics (especially atoms and accidents). Missing beginning folios and includes notes in the margins. DP uncertain about authorship.
Title: Risālah fī al-nujūm; Pp. 257-274. Treatise on the movement of the stars. Missing beginning and end folios, includes notes in the margins and nine astronomical figures. Author is unknown.
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 6, 37
Description.note: This volume contains several minor Persian pieces (correspondence and poetry) in pp. 2-14, listed in DP 660.  None are really "works," although there is a concrete date in one of them (1056 [1646]).  The individual works we have separately logged are nn. 5 and 6 in DP.

Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents:
Title: Lawāmiʿ al-ḥikam fī taḥqīq al-ḥudūth wa-al-qadam; Pp. 2-146. An autograph of the author. A philosophical treatise on eternity and the creation of the world.
Title: al-Yad al-bayḍāʾ; Pp. 147-205. A commentary on Shahīd al-Thānī's work Maʿālim al-dīn. On fiqh and the qualifications of muqallids.
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 11, 58

Description.tableOfContents:
Title: Kubrā; Pp. 2-107. On logic and philosophy.
Title: Tahdhīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām; Pp. 107-141. On logic and philosophy. Fragment.
Title: al-Kāfiyah; On Arabic language and grammar. The end folios are missing.
Title: page 290

Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents:
Title: Risālah fī al-ḥikmah; On a variety of subjects concerning philosophy and science. Missing end folios. Author is unknown.
Title: Risālah fī al-ḥikmah; On the nature and the perception of the soul. Author is unknown.
Title: Tahdīb al-manṭiq wa-al-kalām; A fragment from Taftazānī's Tahdīb al-Manṭiq wa-al-Kalām. Missing end folios.
Title: Risālah fī al-ṭabīʿiyāt; On natural philosophy, humors, and specific elements.
Title: Arbaʿūn ḥadīthan; A commentary on the forty ḥadīth of the Prophet Muḥammad.

Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents:
Title: al-Durrah al-fākhirah; A theological treatise on God's attributes and His unity.
Title: Risālah fī itiḥād al-ʿaql wa-al-maʿqūl; A philosophical treatise on the unity between the intellect and its object.
Title: Is̱bāt-i ḥarakat-i javāhirī; A philosophical treatise on the nature of essential motion.
Title: Hayākil al-nūr; A philosophical treatise on self knowledge and some mystical aspects concerning the universe. Author is unknown.
Title: Risālah fī al-kufr wa-al-īmān; A theological treatise concerning faith and blasphemy in Islamic law.
Title: Risālah fī al-juzʾ alladhī lā-yatajazá; A philosophical treatise on natural philosophy concerning indivisible matter.
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 20, 121
